BasicDescription.Title: Bargain Hunt
讨价还价
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The Bargain Hunt teams head to Staffordshire's County Showground.
谈判小组前往斯塔福德郡的县陈列室。
The Bargain Hunt teams head to Staffordshire's County Showground, where both experts face double trouble.
讨价还价小组前往斯塔福德郡的县展示场，两位专家都在那里面临双重麻烦。

ParentalGuidance.ExplanatoryText: Contains strong language and flash photography
包含强烈的语言和闪光摄影
